text: @SpeakerPelosi Pelosi you and your loons have used Coronavirus to play politics with our country. You and your gangs irresponsible actions this past week have hurt all hardworking tax paying citizen’s retirement funds. You and your gang have caused CalPERS to lose $15 billion. Shameful https://t.co/ryT9fnPcvM
